title: LINK : fatal error LNK1181 (kernel32.lib)
body:
I use `stable-aarch64-pc-windows-msvc (default)` and I have x86_64 machine on the other hand. 

When I try to install particularly anything on my x86_64 windows machine, it works perfectly. However, when I use my arm64 machine to install binary for example lsd, it throws the following:

```
PS C:\Users\sakhib> cargo install lsd
    Updating crates.io index
  Installing lsd v0.23.1
   Compiling autocfg v1.1.0
   Compiling winapi v0.3.9
   Compiling proc-macro2 v1.0.56
error: linking with `link.exe` failed: exit code: 1181
```
